snippet: A man was charged Wednesday with murdering a 9-year-old, while, according to the authorities, shooting randomly at passing cars in Oakdale, a St. Paul.
abstract: Minnesota man Nhan Lap Tran is charged with murdering 9-year-old boy and wounding his mother and another woman while randomly shooting at passing cars in Oakdale, suburb of St Paul, Minn.
lead_paragraph: A man was charged Wednesday with murdering a 9-year-old, while, according to the authorities, shooting randomly at passing cars in Oakdale, a St. Paul.

headline.main: Minnesota: 9-Year-Old Boy Is Killed in Shooting
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: 9-Year-Old Boy Is Killed In Shooting
